components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Babilon-M Network in Tajikistan

incident_updates.body: We are still experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Babilon-M network in Tajikistan. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Babilon-M network in Tajikistan. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.
Twilio callback service is now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.
Twilio callback service is now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Twilio callback service is degraded and customers may experience failed webhook callbacks for a small portion of their traffic. Our engineering team is currently investigating the root cause of the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Malaysia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Maxis

incident_updates.body: The Maxis network in Malaysia is conducting a planned maintenance from 12 March 2025 at 09:00 PDT until 12 March 2025 at 15:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Maxis Malaysia handsets.

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in the United States and Canada is conducting a planned maintenance from 12 March 2025 at 15:00 PDT until 12 March 2025 at 22:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from United States and Canada handsets via subset of United States and Canada long codes and short codes.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States Account Security Service Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our service partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 12 March 2025 at 19:00 PDT until 12 March 2025 at 22:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for the following carriers and country: AT&T Mobility United States, Sprint United States, T-Mobile United States, Verizon Wireless United States.

Impacted Products: Lookup Identity Match, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States and Canada Twilio SMS and MMS Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Twilio is conducting planned maintenance over Silver Spring Datacenter from 15 March 2025 at 17:00 PDT until 15 March 2025 at 23:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays or failures delivering SMS and MMS to and from United States and Canada handsets via subset long code and toll free numbers. There will be no service impact for customers connected via TLS and those connected to our Seattle Datacenter.

Twilio is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 05 March 2025 at 20:00 PST until 27 March 2025 at 00:00 PDT. 05 March 2025 at 20:00 PST until 06 March 2025 at 00:00 PST
12 March 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 13 March 2025 at 00:00 PDT
19 March 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 20 March 2025 at 00:00 PDT
26 March 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 27 March 2025 at 00:00 PDT

We are aware of the short notice. We are working to provide earlier notification where possible.
